front.text: June 29 08 9:45 P.M. Just a word to you this time. I began work this morning + am a little tired to night. Our work will be fine after we once get started. We are going to have the finest kind of [board] when we get started. I will write you all about it. Write soon.

back.image: Felt flag with Yale label surrounded by various school flags along the border> YALE Princeton, Army, Cornell, New York, Brown, Harvard, Columbia, Dartmouth, Ill, Chicago, Penn, Navy
back.text: I do not know many of them. Do you?
